abstract: Adds a tensor-tensor select operation to the current graph.

declaration.code: func select<U>(_ valueIfTrue: BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<U>, _ valueIfFalse: BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<U>) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<U> where U : BNNSScalar

overview:
## Discussion

For example, the following code returns the `valueIfTrue` elements when the corresponding elements in `z` are `true` and the elements in `valueIfFalse` when the corresponding elements in `z` are `false`:
title: select(_:_:)
